articles.author: Sean O'Kane
articles.title: Google’s bringing Gemini to your car with Android Auto - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google is bringing Gemini, its generative AI, to all cars that support Android Auto in the next few months, the company announced at its Android Show
articles.content: Google is bringing Gemini, its generative AI, to all cars that support Android Auto in the next few months, the company announced at its Android Show ahead of the company’s 2025 I/O developer confere… [+3407 chars]
